participant_1.name: Liam
participant_1.personality: Friendly and open-minded, enjoys sharing experiences and learning from others.
participant_1.background: I have freckles all over my face. I was in the army. I work in construction. I drive a prius. I love to read romance novels.

participant_2.name: Emma
participant_2.personality: Introverted and cautious, prefers to keep things personal and has a quirky sense of humor.
participant_2.background: I don't like being asked a lot of questions. I don't like when people get too close to me. I have a shopping addiction. I think about food a lot.

content.text: I'm a construction worker. I love my job. I get to work outside and I'm always learning new things.
That sounds interesting. I work in retail and I'm not so happy with it.
What don't you like about it?
I don't like being asked a lot of questions by customers.
I can see how that could be annoying.
It is. And I don't like when people get too close to me.
That's understandable. I'm a pretty private person myself.
I have a shopping addiction. I can't stop buying things.
I'm not much of a shopper myself. I usually just buy what I need.
I think about food a lot. I love food.
Me too! Food is one of my favorite things.
I'm glad we have something in common.
